Text:
Next week...the French Fuzz are back!

Spiral Series 3

1/12.The Butcher of La Villette, Episode 1
When the body of a young woman is found, police captain Laure Berthaud investigates.

2/12The Butcher of La Villette, Episode 2
With a second girl reported missing, police take in another suspect.
Such a fantastic series -- don't want it to end, but want to know how it ends -- go figure! Thank you so much Robston.
